decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby approved shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith (01, 02, 03/B, 04, 05, Design & Access Statement, received 31 July 2014; Flood Risk Assessment prepared by John Molloy, received 06 August 2014) and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby approved shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No additional flank windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side elevations of the extensions hereby approved without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The roof area of the single storey rear extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a single store rear extension, two storey side extension and installation of 3 front roof windows to existing house
